items.name: WikiAnimate Wiki
items.title: WikiAnimate Wiki
items.headline: You're #1 GoAnimate Wiki!
items.desc:
Have you ever wondered why there was never a proper GoAnimate wiki, until now? Well, we may never find out, but feel free to visit an imaginative community full of respect, integrity, and no discrimination (of any users, those who use Wikia or not) whatsoever. We pledge to always respect one's opinions while adding more to this quite interesting wiki! Please join today :D!

-Tigrus879

items.name: New Wikianimate Wikia
items.title: New Wikianimate Wikia
items.desc: Hello, Tigrus879 here, and welcome to Wikianimate, a forum of boundless imagination and creativity! This particular one is not to be confused with its flawed precursor of the same name. I made the decision to hand it over to the grounded video community and launch a new, improved, and concise Wikianimate entitled "creatively", New Wikianimate, with my new Wikia account (considering my older one was inactive to the point where accessing it was a huge struggle).
